LanguageData.BlindingCeremony_Know_Horrible.stages.bl: We blinded someone over ideoligious beliefs! This is wrong!
LanguageData.BlindingCeremony_Self_Elevated.stages.wa: I was blinded in a righteous ceremony. Finally, I can start learning to see.
LanguageData.BlindingCeremony_Self_Respected.stages.w: I was blinded in a righteous ceremony. Finally, I can start learning to see.
LanguageData.BlindingCeremony_Self_Sublime.stages.was: I was blinded in a righteous ceremony. Finally, I can start learning to see.
LanguageData.Blindness_ArtificialBlind.stages.vision_: Blocking my vision gives my mind closer access to true reality. It's not as good as a permanent blinding, but it's acceptable.
LanguageData.Blindness_Elevated_Blind.stages.blind.de: I can explore a greater awareness through my inability to see.
LanguageData.Blindness_Elevated_HalfBlind.stages.half: I am on my way to enlightment through blindness.
LanguageData.Blindness_Elevated_NonBlind.stages.not_b: I wish to be blind so I can connect better with the true reality. Or, at a minimum, I should be blindfolded.
LanguageData.Blindness_Respected_Blind.stages.blind.d: Now that my sight is gone, I can see clearly.
LanguageData.Blindness_Sublime_Blind.stages.blind.des: I am free to explore the depths of my mind and the true reality without my sight limiting me.
LanguageData.Blindness_Sublime_HalfBlind.stages.halfb: I am on the verge of true enlightment through blindness.
LanguageData.Blindness_Sublime_NonBlind.stages.not_bl: I wish to be blind so much. I need these physical sights gone so I can touch the true reality. At a minimum, I should wear a blindfold.
